sense.def:
Readjustment
je usklajevanje svojega vedênja z novimi okoliščinami.

seg.quote: The launch requires great readjustments on all sides.

sense.def:
A readjustment to something
je sprememba v nastavitvi naprave ali organizaciji dela, tako da deluje drugače.

seg.quote: Most schools now face a readjustment of their timetables.
